author: Phil Vickery
method: Put the garlic, white wine, clams and boiling water into a medium saucepan, cover with a lid and cook for five minutes, or until all the clams have opened. Drain and discard any that haven't opened. Toss the clams with the cooked tagliatelle, place in a bowl and sprinkle with parsley, to serve.
ingredients: 1 garlic clove, crushed,  75ml/2½fl oz white wine,  125g/4½oz clams, rinsed in clean cold water,  50ml/2fl oz boiling water,  100g/4oz tagliatelle, cooked,  2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley
